mapper.select: select r.* from resume r left join category c on r.resume_id=c.category_resume_id where c.category_name='Java' limit 20 offset #{startNum}

SELECT totalCount, totalPage, currentPage, case when currentPage=0 then 1 else 0 end as isFirst, case when currentPage=totalPage-1 then 1 else 0 end as isLast FROM ( select count(*) totalCount, ceil(count(*)/20) totalPage, #{page} currentPage, 0 isFirst, 0 isLast FROM recruit ) b
select * from recruit inner join company on recruit.recruit_company_id=company.company_id order by recruit.recruit_created_at desc limit 20 offset #{startNum}

select recruit.*, result.count from recruit left join (select *, count(*) count from (select c2.* from (select category.* from (select resume.* from resume inner join user on user.user_id=resume.resume_user_id where user_id=#{userId}) r inner join category on r.resume_id=category.category_resume_id group by category_name) c1 join (SELECT * FROM category WHERE category_recruit_id is not null) c2 on c1.category_name=c2.category_name) list group by category_recruit_id) result on recruit.recruit_id=result.category_recruit_id order by count DESC
select * from recruit order by recruit_created_at desc
select * from recruit order by ( CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(recruit_career,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(recruit_career,1)) < 123 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END ), binary(recruit_career)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit(recruit_title, recruit_career, recruit_salary, recruit_location, recruit_content, recruit_read_count, recruit_company_id, recruit_deadline, recruit_created_at) VALUES(#{recruitTitle}, #{recruitCareer}, #{recruitSalary},#{recruitLocation}, #{recruitContent}, 0, #{recruitCompanyId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recruit WHERE recruit_title LIKE '%'||#{recruitTitle}||'%'
SELECT * FROM recruit LEFT JOIN company ON recruit.recruit_company_id = company.company_id WHERE recruit.recruit_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE recruit SET recruit_title = #{recruitTitle}, recruit_career = #{recruitCareer}, recruit_salary = #{recruitSalary}, recruit_location = #{recruitLocation}, recruit_content = #{recruitContent}, recruit_deadline = #{recruitDeadline} WHERE recruit_id = #{recruitId};
